mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE(MESSAGE_NO, MESSAGE_SENDER, MESSAGE_RECEIVER, MESSAGE_SUBJECT, MESSAGE_CONTENT) VALUES(MESSAGE_seq.nextval, #{MESSAGE_SENDER}, #{MESSAGE_RECEIVER}, #{MESSAGE_SUBJECT}, #{MESSAGE_CONTENT})
mapper.select:
SELECT MESSAGE_NO, MESSAGE_SUBJECT, MESSAGE_CONTENT, MESSAGE_SENDER, MESSAGE_SENDTIME FROM MESSAGE
ORDER BY MESSAGE_NO DESC, MESSAGE_SENDTIME DESC
